text: is a Japanese actor. His career spans more than 30 years. Among his movies are Bee Bop High School (1985), Bee Bop highschool; Koko yotaro elegy (1986), Bee Bop highschool; Koko yotaro march (1987), and Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie (1994). ==Selected filmography== *Bee Bop High School – 1985 *Bee Bop highschool; Koko yotaro elegy – 1986 *Bee Bop highschool; Koko yotaro march – 1987 *Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie – 1994 ==External links== * Category:Japanese male film actors Category:1964 births Category:Living people
title: Kojiro Shimizu
